section.title: Tracking of changes in response to the Public Review of the Candidate OASIS Standard 01
section.para: This section tracks all changes made to this specification compared to the Candidate OASIS Standard 01 http://docs.oasis-open.org/xliff/xliff-core/v2.1/cos01/xliff-core-v2.1-cos01.html. This Public Review took place from [date] until [date].

listitem.para: [Description of the change(s)] in response to Comment/Issue https://github.com/oasis-tcs/lexidma/issues/xxx. [Additional info on the change(s)].
